name: Inzektor Ladybug
effectText: Once per turn: You can equip 1 "Inzektor" monster from your hand or GY to this card. While this card is equipped to a monster, that monster's Level is increased by 2, also it gains ATK/DEF equal to this card's ATK/DEF. While this card is equipped to a monster: You can send this Equip Card to the GY, then target 1 face-up monster you control; increase that target's Level by 1 or 2.
